lines.text: ...This guy wasn't like me, was he?
Y'know, someone on parole, working for the cops.
We don't do that kind of thing too often- you just had your extenuatin' circumstances, and all.
Man, why not? If you guys could use magic yourselves, you'd be way better at doing...
Uh, all the stuff cops do, which is bad. Suggestion retracted.
We don't use magic because usin' magic risks lettin' demons loose and rampagin' across the city. That's why it's illegal.
Not all of it! There's plenty of magic that's perfectly saf-
Pack it in, kid. I don't need to hear your legalization screed again.
